description: Lists all the transaction events for a transaction.

parameters.name: address
parameters.description: The address (either a contract or wallet), whose transactions are being requested.

parameters.name: network
parameters.description: The blockchain network where the transactions occurred.

parameters.name: fromBlockchainInstant
parameters.description: The container for time. time (datetime) --- The container of the Timestamp of the blockchain instant.

nested_params.name: time
nested_params.description: The container of the Timestamp of the blockchain instant.

parameters.name: toBlockchainInstant
parameters.description: The container for time. time (datetime) --- The container of the Timestamp of the blockchain instant.

nested_params.name: time
nested_params.description: The container of the Timestamp of the blockchain instant.

parameters.name: sort
parameters.description: The order by which the results will be sorted. sortBy (string) --- Defaults to the value TRANSACTION_TIMESTAMP. sortOrder (string) --- The container for the sort order for ListTransactions. The SortOrder field only accepts the values ASCENDING and DESCENDING. Not providing SortOrder will default to ASCENDING.

nested_params.name: sortOrder
nested_params.description: The container for the sort order for ListTransactions. The SortOrder field only accepts the values ASCENDING and DESCENDING. Not providing SortOrder will default to ASCENDING.

parameters.name: maxResults
parameters.description: The maximum number of transactions to list. Default: 100

parameters.name: confirmationStatusFilter
parameters.description: This filter is used to include transactions in the response that haven't reached finality. Transactions that have reached finality are always part of the response. The container to determine whether to list results that have only reached finality. (string) ---

nested_params.name: include
nested_params.description: The container to determine whether to list results that have only reached finality. Transactions that have reached finality are always part of the response.

nested_items.name: transactions
nested_items.description: The array of transactions returned by the request.

nested_items.name: transactionHash
nested_items.description: The hash of a transaction. It is generated when a transaction is created.

nested_items.name: transactionId
nested_items.description: The identifier of a Bitcoin transaction. It is generated when a transaction is created.

nested_items.name: network
nested_items.description: The blockchain network where the transaction occurred.

nested_items.name: transactionTimestamp
nested_items.description: The time when the transaction occurred.

nested_items.name: confirmationStatus
nested_items.description: Specifies whether to list transactions that have not reached Finality.

nested_items.name: nextToken
nested_items.description: The pagination token that indicates the next set of results to retrieve.
